title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
content: I get the reply notifications on the email but imagine forum allows account to be created without email address and some don't have attached a real email address either. Anyway, this is something I told from another scene. Leave that.Is any of the existing telegram Bot has the feature to monitor replies on given topic ids?

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Nijastics telegram bot can do that but just that you will get the notification of any reply and that can be annoying. I prefer the notification through the email because no further notification until you check the previous ones.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on February 15, 2023, 06:14:36 PMNijastics telegram bot can do that but just that you will get the notification of any reply and that can be annoying.Any notification of what? From a single topic or reply from all over the forum? I need all the replies notification from a single topic, so I won't get bored actually. I used to get through email, I had to change email too (though it was a mistake lol). But now I need instant notification.Edit- got it. Thanks.
